title: Sound On: Ethics of Lawmaker Stock Trades (Radio)
itunes:title: Sound On: Ethics of Lawmaker Stock Trades (Radio)
description:
Bloomberg Washington Correspondent Joe Mathieu delivers insight and analysis on the latest headlines from the White House and Capitol Hill, including conversations with influential lawmakers and key figures in politics and policy.


Guests: Kedric Payne, Campaign Legal Center General Counsel and Senior Director of Ethics, Cornell Law School Professor Robert Hockett, Bloomberg News Congress reporter Billy House, and Bloomberg politics contributors Rick Davis and Jeanne Sheehan Zaino.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
